title: Game Scoop Episode 562
description: There are lots of game delays to discuss this week, and also some big 2020 games we're still waiting on release dates for. We're also talking about Sony blowing off another E3 and a new retro game streaming service.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: There are lots of game delays to discuss this week, and also some big 2020 games we're still waiting on release dates for. We're also talking about Sony blowing off another E3 and a new retro game streaming service.
